ttp_template:
<group name="msgs_rcvd_msgs_sent_peer_id_state">
  State: Oper; Msgs sent/rcvd: 2{{UPTIME | ORPHRASE}}4/253; Downstream
Peer LDP Identifier: {{PEER_ID | ORPHRASE}}
  TCP connection: {{TCP_CONN | ORPHRASE}}
  State: {{STATE | ORPHRASE}}; Msgs sent/rcvd: {{MSGS_SENT}}/{{MSGS_RCVD | ORPHRASE}}; Downstream
  {{TARGET_HELLO | ORPHRASE}}
</group>
cli_content:
Peer LDP Identifier: 10.1.1.1:0
  TCP connection: 10.1.1.2:18003 - 10.1.1.1:646
  State: Oper; Msgs sent/rcvd: 254/253; Downstream
  Up time: 2w0d
  LDP Discovery Sources:
    Interfaces:
      GigabitEthernet0/1 (ldp): xmit/recv
    Targeted Hellos:
      10.1.1.2 -> 10.1.1.1

Peer LDP Identifier: 20.1.1.1:0
  TCP connection: 20.1.1.2:18003 - 20.1.1.1:646
  State: Non-oper; Msgs sent/rcvd: 100/99; Downstream
  Up time: 5d3h
  LDP Discovery Sources:
    Interfaces:
      GigabitEthernet0/2 (ldp): xmit/recv
    Targeted Hellos:
      20.1.1.2 -> 20.1.1.1
textfsm_template:
Value PEER_ID (\S+:\d+)
Value TCP_CONN (\S+:\d+ - \S+:\d+)
Value STATE (\S+)
Value MSGS_SENT (\d+)
Value MSGS_RCVD (\d+)
Value UPTIME (.+?)
Value INTERFACE (\S+)
Value TARGET_HELLO (\S+ -> \S+)

Start
  ^Peer LDP Identifier: ${PEER_ID}
  ^\s*TCP connection: ${TCP_CONN}
  ^\s*State: ${STATE}; Msgs sent/rcvd: ${MSGS_SENT}/${MSGS_RCVD}; .*
  ^\s*Up time: ${UPTIME}
  ^\s*Interfaces:
  ^\s*${INTERFACE}\s.*\s->\s.*
  ^\s*Targeted Hellos:
  ^\s*${TARGET_HELLO}\s*$$ -> Record
